Articles.Content: So I am assembling a space station to provide a medium for a tutorial on such things, I thought I would leave my rendezvous/docking tutorial here in case anyone here finds it helpful:

Sorry for being mean, but it was very amusing to watch you take 2 minutes of your time trying to dock the two ships at a 90Ã‚Â° angle. It's like watching someone trying to put the square piece into the circular hole and wondering why it isn't going through. With more practice, you'll get good at it.
Hi Bird just watched your videos and now just looking through the forums on more tips for docking i find this again
No offense, but you wasted ÃŽâ€V on your approaching by burning towards the target instead of making adjustments burns and letting the station come to you. Horribly inefficient way to do things IMO.
